_text: Restart the

p._text: When restarting the system all changes are applied which have been executed on the system configuration since the last restart.
After the restart you will be automatically logged out from the web surface and you have to log in again afterwards.

msg_errorreboot._text: You don't have the necessary rights to perform a restart or an error has occurred.

msg_infopendingconfig._text: An updated system configuration has been found which has not yet been applied since a system reboot has not yet been performed.

to carry out a restart of the system so that you can use this configuration.

msg_upload_invalid_filename._text: One or several files with invalid file name found. The invalid files have been removed from the list.

dndlicencefile._text: Drag and drop licence file here!

_text: Drag the licence file to the area marked below or select the file by clicking on the
button in order to update the licences.

p._text: The licence file has been successfully transferred to the server. The server has to be restarted to complete the update. The updated licence will only be available then. Do you wish to restart the server now?

msg_uploadedlicence_success._text: The licence file has been successfully transferred to the server. The server has to be restarted to complete the update. The updated licence will only be available then.

msg_empty_licence_file._text: The licence file does not contain any licences for this device.

msg_pending_licence._text: An updated licence file has been found. The system has to be restarted to activate the licence.

_text: The selected file is invalid. Only licence files with the file names
may be uploaded to the server.
Drag the configuration file to the area marked below or select the file by clicking on the
button in order to update the configuration.

dndconfigfile._text: Drag and drop configuration file here!

_text: The selected file is invalid. Only configuration files with the file names
may be uploaded to the server.

p._text: The configuration file was successfully transferred to the server. To complete the update, the server must be restarted. Only then is the updated configuration active. Should the server now be restarted?
The configuration file was successfully transferred to the server. To complete the update, the server must be restarted.

_text: The dialogue window cannot be closed as long as uploads are still active.
Please wait until all uploads are complete or interrupt the running uploads.

msg_no_valid_licence._text: No valid license was found to activate this property.

no_archive_server_licence._text: No license was found to configure the archive server.

msg_invalidip._text: The settings cannot be saved since the address includes invalid entries.

firmware_state_12._text: Firmware file invalid or containing errors.

firmware_state_13._text: The device number of the firmware file does not correspond to the device.

dndfirmware._text: Transfer firmware via drag and drop

msg_firmware_check_in_progress._text: The dialogue window cannot be closed as long as the firmware is checked.

msg_firmware_update_in_progress._text: The dialogue window cannot be closed as long as the firmware is updated.

firmware_update_success._text: The firmware has been updated successfully.

firmware_update_error._text: An error has occurred when updating the firmware.

_text: Drag the firmware file downwards into the area marked or select the file by clicking on the
button to update the firmware. Then the file will be automatically transferred to the server. Then it can be installed.
Update firmware?
When the update has been completed the server will be restarted and you need to log in again.

msg_firmware_concurrent._text: This action cannot be carried out since another user is already involved with it.

msg_notenoughspace._text: The file cannot be transferred since there is not enough space available on the hard disk.

To complete the update, the server must be restarted.

To complete the update, the server must be restarted.

msg_ssl_uploadinfo._text: You must transfer the file containing the new certificate to the server for updating the SSL certificate. In addition the password for the certificate is required.

msg_dnd_sslfile._text: Drag the file containing the SSL certificate downwards into the marked field.

dnd_ssl_file._text: Select the SSL certificate via drag and drop

ssl_upload_error._text: An error has occurred whilst transferring the SSL certificate to the server.

ssl_file_transfer_success._text: The SSL certificate has been successfully transferred to the server.

ssl_update_error._text: An error has occurred whilst updating the SSL certificate.

_text: Should the SSL certificate be deleted?
To complete the update, the server must be restarted.

ssl_delete_success._text: The SSL certificate was deleted on the server.

ssl_delete_error._text: An error occurred whilst deleting the SSL certificate.
